direct_task_results.DESCRIPTION: Energy, force, and virial prediction accuracy of the model on the test sets accross multiple domains.

HPt_NC_2022.DESCRIPTION: A direct two-phase simulation of heterogeneous hydrogen turnover on the Pt(111) catalyst surface at chemical accuracy. Calculations were performed using VASP with PBE/PAW and an energy cutoff of 450 eV. [https://arxiv.org/abs/2106.01949]

energy_rmse.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of the energy prediction, in eV.

energy_mae.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the energy prediction, in eV.

energy_rmse_natoms.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of the energy prediction per atom, in eV/atom.

energy_mae_natoms.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the energy prediction per atom, in eV/atom.

force_rmse.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of the force prediction, in eV/Å.

force_mae.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the force prediction, in eV/Å.

virial_rmse.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of the virial prediction, in eV.

virial_rmse_natoms.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of the virial prediction per atom, in eV/atom.

virial_mae_natoms.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the virial prediction per atom, in eV/atom.

MD22.DESCRIPTION: Dataset containing MD trajectories of the 42-atom tetrapeptide Ac-Ala3-NHMe from the MD22 benchmark set. Calculations were performed using FHI-aims and i-Pi software at the DFT-PBE+MBD level of theory. Trajectories were sampled at temperatures between 400-500 K at 1 fs resolution. [https://www.science.org/doi/10.1126/sciadv.adf0873]

energy_rmse.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of the energy prediction, in eV.

energy_mae.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the energy prediction, in eV.

Ca_batteries_CM2021.DESCRIPTION: A dataset of Ca-bearing minerals, focusing on silicates and carbonates such as olivine, pyroxene, garnet, amphibole, and double carbonates. Calculations were performed using VASP with spin-polarized PBE/PAW and an energy cutoff of 600 eV. [https://www.nature.com/articles/s41598-019-46002-4]

energy_rmse.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of the energy prediction, in eV.

energy_mae.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the energy prediction, in eV.

NequIP_NC_2022.DESCRIPTION: Approximately 57,000 configurations from the evaluation datasets for NequIP graph neural network model for interatomic potentials. Trajectories have been taken from Li-P-S, Li-P-O glass melt-quench simulation, and formate decomposition on Cu datasets. Calculations were performed using VASP with PBE/PAW and an energy cutoff of 400 eV. [https://www.nature.com/articles/s41467-022-29939-5]

energy_rmse.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of the energy prediction, in eV.

ANI.DESCRIPTION: The training dataset of ANI-1x model. 5.5 M structures, is 25% the size of the dataset used in training the original ANI-1 potential (22 M). Calculations were performed using Gaussian with ωB97x/6-31G*. [https://doi.org/10.1063/1.5023802]

Collision.DESCRIPTION: Validation set from COLL. Consists of configurations taken from molecular collisions of different small organic molecules. Energies and forces were recomputed with DFT using the revPBE functional and def2-TZVP basis, including D3 dispersion corrections. [https://arxiv.org/abs/2011.14115]

CGM_MLP_NC2023.DESCRIPTION: Dynamic simulations of carbon deposition on metal surfaces like Cu(111), Cr(110), Ti(001), and oxygen-contaminated Cu(111). Calculations were performed using CP2K with PBE-D3/DZVP-SR-GTH and 300Ry/60Ry cutoff. [https://www.nature.com/articles/s41467-023-44525-z]

Subalex_9k.DESCRIPTION: A subsampled, Matbench-Discovery compliant version of the original Alexandria dataset. Calculations were performed using VASP with PBE/PAW and 520 eV cutoff. [https://arxiv.org/abs/2410.12771]

Torsionnet500.DESCRIPTION: TorsionNet500, a benchmark dataset comprising 500 chemically diverse fragments with DFT torsion profiles (12k MM- and DFT-optimized geometries and energies). AIMD-Chig.DESCRIPTION: MD dataset including 2 million conformations of 166-atom protein Chignolin sampled at the density functional theory (DFT) level. Ab initio simulations were driven by M062X/6-31G* with a Berendsen thermostat at 340 K.[https://www.nature.com/articles/s41597-023-02465-9]

HEA25_S.DESCRIPTION: A dataset of 25-atom high entropy alloy surfaces, focusing on 25 d-block transition metals, excluding Tc, Cd, Re, Os and Hg. Calculations were performed using VASP with PBEsol/PAW, 550 eV cutoff, and Γ-centered k-points. [https://arxiv.org/abs/2212.13254]

WBM_downsampled.DESCRIPTION: Dataset of hydrogen combustion reactions. Calculations were performed using Q-Chem with ωB97X-V/cc-pVTZ. H_nature_2022.DESCRIPTION: Dataset of hydrogen combustion reactions. Calculations were performed using Q-Chem with ωB97X-V/cc-pVTZ. [https://www.nature.com/articles/s41597-022-01330-5]

finetune_task_results.DESCRIPTION: Accuracy of the property finetuning task. Note: The test results does not represent the converged accuracy due to limited fine-tuning steps.

Matbench_mp_e_form.DESCRIPTION: Formation energy of materials, in eV/atom. 5-fold average.

property_rmse.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of formation energy of materials

property_mae.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of formation energy of materials

Matbench_mp_gap.DESCRIPTION: Band gap of materials, in eV. 5-fold average.

property_rmse.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of band gap of materials

property_mae.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of band gap of materials

Matbench_jdft2d.DESCRIPTION: 2D exfoliation energy from JARVIS-DFT dataset, in meV/atom. 5-fold average.

property_rmse.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of 2D exfoliation energy

property_mae.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of 2D exfoliation energy

Matbench_phonons.DESCRIPTION: Frequency of the highest frequency optical phonon mode peak, in units of 1/cm. 5-fold average.

property_rmse.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of the highest frequency optical phonon mode peak

property_mae.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the highest frequency optical phonon mode peak

Matbench_dielectric.DESCRIPTION: Refractive index of materials, unitless. 5-fold average.

property_rmse.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of the refractive index

property_mae.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the refractive index

Matbench_log_kvrh.DESCRIPTION: Logarithm of the DFT Voigt-Reuss-Hill average bulk moduli in GPa. 5-fold average.

property_rmse.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of the logarithm of the bulk modulus

property_mae.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the logarithm of the bulk modulus

Matbench_log_gvrh.DESCRIPTION: Logarithm of the DFT Voigt-Reuss-Hill average shear moduli in GPa. 5-fold average.

property_rmse.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of the logarithm of the shear modulus

property_mae.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the logarithm of the shear modulus

Matbench_perovskites.DESCRIPTION: Formation energy of perovskites, in eV/unit cell. 5-fold average.

property_rmse.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of the formation energy of perovskites

property_mae.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the formation energy of perovskites

nve_md.DESCRIPTION: Inspecting conservativeness via NVE Molecular Dynamics simulation.

slope.DESCRIPTION: The slope of the energy drift, in eV/atom/ps.

momenta_diff.DESCRIPTION: The mean momentum difference, in amu · Å/fs.

simulation_time.DESCRIPTION: The time taken to simulate 10 ps, in seconds.

success_rate.DESCRIPTION: The success rate of the simulation over 9 test cases.
